long_description: Sit back and relax as you paddle around in the Dio PFD from MTI. It rides high in back and features compact back padding so you can take full advantage of your kayak's seating. Durable Cordura(R) nylon shell with closed-cell foam flotation delivers long-lasting service and high performance. Foam is shaped to reduce bulkiness on the back of the PFD, affording more room to sit back and enjoy your kayak. Mesh back and open sides add comfort and free arm movement. Shoulder adjustments are covered to add protection and provide a smooth, finished look to the vest. 2 mesh pockets stash on-the-water essentials. Reflective tape increases visibility of the MTI Dio in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Sit back and relax as you paddle around in the Dio PFD from MTI. It rides high in back and features compact back padding so you can take full advantage of your kayak's seating.
